short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bookmark timestamps on Netflix episodes. Easily find and revisit your favorite moments on Netflix.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bookmark timestamps on Netflix episodes. Easily find and revisit your favorite moments on Netflix.

Bookmark a Scene:
Have you ever wanted to bookmark a specific scene in a Netflix episode? Now you can! With my Chrome extension, you can click a button to bookmark the episode. After you enter a name for your bookmark, the extension will save it to a list. Then, you can open the extension and click on the bookmark to automatically visit the episode’s scene.

Search for Bookmarks:
You can easily find a scene by typing the scene’s name into the Chrome extension’s search bar. This will automatically find the scene in your saved bookmarks. Then, you can click on the bookmark to automatically view the scene on Netflix. This means you no longer have to waste time searching for the episode on the Netflix website!

Organize Your Bookmarks:
The extension will automatically organize your bookmarks by Netflix series. This will help you find your bookmarks more easily.

Privacy:
Your bookmarks are stored on your browser, so there is no need to worry about privacy.

Download:
What are you waiting for? Install the Chrome extension today and make your life easier.

Requested Permissions:
Tabs: This permission allows the extension to check if you have any Netflix tabs open. It also allows the extension to get a Netflix tab's URL to bookmark it.
Storage: The extension uses this permission to save bookmarks.
Scripting: This permission enables the extension to set the Netflix episode's time.
Active tab: The extension needs this permission to make network requests to Netflix to get an episode's series name.

Note: This extension is not affiliated with the company "Netflix."
